doc.name: BoxedValueIcon
doc.description:
An icon that displays the value of an attribute of the container in a box that resizes according to the width of the attribute value.

If the value is long, then the value is truncated and ends with "...". See truncateString(String, int, int). This is done so as to avoid Consts with overly long icons.

The attribute is assumed to be an instance of Settable, and its name is given by the parameter attributeName.
doc.author: Edward A. Lee
doc.property: Color of the box. This defaults to white.
